item.description:
This movie looks like quite the chuckle!

A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

Cast: Vince Vaughn, Jason Bateman, Faizon Love, Jean Reno, Jon Favreau, Kristen Bell, Kristin Davis, Kali Hawk. Malin Ackerman

Grab a ticket first for the 8:15 show, and lets meet at Chilli's for dinner. Ask for Deb's table.

You can reach me at 508-415-0590.

This meetup will be combined with Girl Fun.
item.name: Dinner & Movie - Couples Retreat
